context.title: ModeShape View
context.description: The ModeShape View shows all registered servers and their repositories and workspaces.

context.title: Server Dialog
context.description: The ModeShape Server Dialog allows you to edit or create a server that hosts one or more repositories.

context.title: ModeShape Publishing Operations Dialog Help
context.description: The Publishing Operations Dialog uploads or removes selected resources from the selected server.

context.title: ModeShape Preference Pages Help
context.description: The ModeShape Preferences Dialog allows you to identify file and folder name patterns that should not be involved in publishing operations.

context.title: ModeShape Message Console
context.description: The ModeShape Message Console contains the output from the publishing and unpublishing operations.
